languages.text: {n}Ведомый вашим окриком, Паскаль запускает стальную руку глубоко в рану на груди, сжимает пальцы. Раздается металлический скрип... И пальцы бессильно разжимаются.{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Мотивационный комплекс единицы ослаблен".

{n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."
languages.original_text: {n}Ведомый вашим окриком, Паскаль запускает стальную руку глубоко в рану на груди, сжимает пальцы. Раздается металлический скрип... И пальцы бессильно разжимаются.{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Мотивационный комплекс единицы ослаблен".

traits.locale_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal thrusts his metal hand deep into the wound on his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが命令すると、パスカルの金属製の手が胸の傷に深く食い込み、何かを握りしめる。金属的なきしみ音が聞こえ…彼の指が力なく緩む。{/n}「要求は却下された。このユニットのモチベーションコンプレックスは弱まっています」
languages.original_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが命令すると、パスカルの金属製の手が胸の傷に深く食い込み、何かを握りしめる。金属的なきしみ音が聞こえ…彼の指が力なく緩む。{/n}「要求は却下された。このユニットのモチベーションコンプレックスは弱まっています」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}在你的命令之下，帕斯卡将金属手深深地伸进胸口伤口中，抓住了什么东西。你听到了金属的嘎吱声……随后，他的手指无力地松开了。{/n}“请求已拒绝，本单位的动机区块遭到了削弱。”
languages.original_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."

traits.locale_text: {n}在你的命令之下，帕斯卡将金属手深深地伸进胸口伤口中，抓住了什么东西。你听到了金属的嘎吱声……随后，他的手指无力地松开了。{/n}“请求已拒绝，本单位的动机区块遭到了削弱。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}A tu orden, Pasqal hunde su mano metálica profundamente en la herida de su pecho y se aferra a algo. Oyes un crujido metálico... y luego sus dedos se aflojan impotentes.{/n} «Petición denegada. El complejo motivacional de esta unidad está debilitado».
languages.original_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."

traits.locale_text: {n}A tu orden, Pasqal hunde su mano metálica profundamente en la herida de su pecho y se aferra a algo. Oyes un crujido metálico... y luego sus dedos se aflojan impotentes.{/n} «Petición denegada. El complejo motivacional de esta unidad está debilitado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Auf deinen Befehl hin taucht Pasqal seine metallene Hand in die Wunde auf seiner Brust und ergreift etwas. Du hörst ein metallisches Knarzen ... und dann lösen seine Finger sich kraftlos.{/n} "Anfrage abgewiesen. Der Motivationskomplex dieser Einheit ist geschwächt."
languages.original_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf deinen Befehl hin taucht Pasqal seine metallene Hand in die Wunde auf seiner Brust und ergreift etwas. Du hörst ein metallisches Knarzen ... und dann lösen seine Finger sich kraftlos.{/n} "Anfrage abgewiesen. Der Motivationskomplex dieser Einheit ist geschwächt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Obéissant à votre commandement, Pasqal plonge sa main dans sa plaie béante et saisit quelque chose. Vous entendez un craquement métallique... et le voyez retirer sa main.{/n} « Requête refusée. Le complexe de motivation de l'unité est affaibli. »
languages.original_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Obéissant à votre commandement, Pasqal plonge sa main dans sa plaie béante et saisit quelque chose. Vous entendez un craquement métallique... et le voyez retirer sa main.{/n} « Requête refusée. Le complexe de motivation de l'unité est affaibli. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Verdiğin emirle birlikte Pasqal, metal elini göğsündeki yaranın derinliklerine sokup bir şeyi sıkıca tutuyor. Metalik bir gıcırtı sesi duyuyorsun... Ardından da Pasqal'ın parmakları âcizce gevşiyor.{/n} "Talep reddedildi. Bu birimin motivasyon kompleksi güçsüz düştü."
languages.original_text: {n}At your command, Pasqal sinks his metal hand deep into the wound in his chest and clutches something. You hear a metallic creak... and then his fingers loosen powerlessly.{/n} "Request denied. This unit's motivational complex is weakened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Verdiğin emirle birlikte Pasqal, metal elini göğsündeki yaranın derinliklerine sokup bir şeyi sıkıca tutuyor. Metalik bir gıcırtı sesi duyuyorsun... Ardından da Pasqal'ın parmakları acizce gevşiyor.{/n} "Talep reddedildi. Bu birimin motivasyon kompleksi güçsüz düştü."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
